task.title: Changing the oil in your car

prereq.p: Before you begin, make sure you know whether you need to use SMTP, Sendmail, or the Mail transport.
Make yourself aware of the configuration settings you'll need for your chosen Transport (for example the SMTP username and password, or your sendmail path on the disk).

context.p: Sending an email takes 4 simple steps, similar to those your mail client would take.

step.cmd: Create an instance of the Transport you choose to use.
Use the Transport to create the Mailer.
Create the Message you want to send.
Send the Message using the Mailer.
